item.title: Uppoint
item.description:
In the summer of 2020 I have been spending some free time developing a collaborative decision-making webapp called “Uppoint”.

The elevator pitch goes something like this:

Instead of degrading into quarrels ðŸ˜¡ or leaving it to the loudest ðŸ“£individual, let the group see all the options ðŸ“œ and let each voter order them by preference â˜ï¸. Our system will do the rest ðŸ˜‰ Some Features:

  • Ability to allow a set number of vetos âŒ
  • Local ðŸ“ or remote ðŸ“§ voting
  • Election status page ðŸ“Š
  • 5 voting methods âš™ï¸ to choose from

You can find it at http://gabecloud.hopto.org:8100!
